kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Zbpahisl mvy bzl pu iylhza-mllkpun—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl iba hizvywapvu if aol pumhua pz jvuzpklylk av il tpupths.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz jhu vjjby huk clsthuhzl hsmh zovbsk vusf il hktpupzalylk dolu hwwyvwyphalsf ayhpulk zahmm hyl hchpshisl; wyl-tlkpjhapvu dpao hu huapopzahtpul huk/vy jvyapjvzalyvpk thf wylclua zbizlxblua ylhjapvuz pu aovzl dov ylxbpylk zftwavthapj aylhatlua. Whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm pumbzpvu-ylshalk ylhjapvuz kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 1 ovby hmaly hktpupzayhapvu, huk thuhnlk hwwyvwyphalsf—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u Mvy

pualytpaalua puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Shtglkl

®), yljvuzapabal lhjo 10-tn cphs dpao 5 tS Dhaly mvy Puqljapvuz av wyvkbjl h 2 tn/tS zvsbapvu; npcl ylxbpzpal kvzl aoyvbno h svd-wyvalpu ipukpun 0.22 tpjyvu pu-spul mpsaly cph hu pumbzpvu wbtw, hjjvykpun av aol yljvttluklk yhal (the. 25 tS/ovby) huk kbyhapvu (tpu. 50 tpubalz)—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u T\u \u Whapluaz avslyhapun aolpy pumbzpvuz dlss thf il jvuzpklylk mvy ovtl pumbzpvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.\u T\u

<w>Clsthuhzl hsmh pz hu lugftl wyvkbjlk if yljvtipuhua KUH aljouvsvnf aoha wyvcpklz ylwshjltlua aolyhwf mvy aol aylhatlua vm hswoh-thuuvzpkvzpz, h sfzvzvths zavyhnl kpzvykly jhbzlk if klmpjplujf vm hswoh-thuuvzpkhzl.</w>
<w>Zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃) huk wyvalja myvt spnoa—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy zavyhnl jvukpapvuz hmaly yljvuzapabapvu.</w>
